hero.title: Home professionals who feel like family
hero.subtitle: Connect with vetted housekeepers and caregivers across Colombia. Fully screened, onboarded, and ready to support your lifestyle.

housekeeping.title: Housekeeping & Deep Cleaning
housekeeping.description: Recurring or one-time solutions tailored to meticulous homes.

childcare.title: Family & Childcare Support
childcare.description: Trusted nannies and caregivers experienced with international households.

relocation.title: Move-in & Relocation Prep
relocation.description: Arrival day setup, unpacking, and home organization services.

elderCare.title: Elder & Wellness Care
elderCare.description: Companionship, medication reminders, and wellness-focused care.

petCare.title: Pet & Home Management
petCare.description: Reliable sitters, walkers, and property check-ins while you travel.

lifestyle.title: Personal Lifestyle Support
lifestyle.description: Private chefs, errand specialists, and personal assistants on demand.

process.title: From search to support in four simple steps

step1.title: Share your household profile
step1.description: Complete our guided intake detailing routines, preferences, languages, and required certifications.

step2.title: Meet curated professionals
step2.description: Receive a shortlist with video intros, verified credentials, and transparent pricing to compare with ease.

step3.title: Book and confirm
step3.description: Schedule your service with instant or approved booking. Communicate directly through secure messaging.

step4.title: Rate and rebook
step4.description: Share feedback after each visit. Save your favorites and rebook with one click for ongoing support.

concierge.title: Ready to find your perfect match?
concierge.subtitle: Schedule a consultation to discuss your household needs. We'll introduce you to vetted professionals within 48 hours.

verifiedProfessionals.title: Verified professionals
verifiedProfessionals.description: Every professional undergoes background checks and identity verification

securePayments.title: Secure payments
securePayments.description: Pay safely through Stripe with escrow protection until service completion

realTimeBooking.title: Real-time booking
realTimeBooking.description: See availability and book instantly or request approval for custom needs

reviewSystem.title: Review system
reviewSystem.description: Two-way reviews ensure accountability and help you make informed decisions
